text: Interview Music is the ninth studio album by Scottish indie rock band Idlewild, released on 5 April 2019 on Empty Words Records. It was produced by Dave Eringa, who had worked on the band's previous albums 100 Broken Windows and The Remote Part. It reached No.22 in the UK album charts. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Idlewild=== *Roddy Woomble – lead vocals, acoustic guitar *Rod Jones – electric guitar, acoustic guitar *Colin Newton – drums, percussion *Andrew Mitchell – bass guitar, backing vocals *Luciano Rossi – piano, keyboards, backing vocals ===Additional musicians=== ===Recording personnel=== *Dave Eringa – producer, mixing ==References== Category:Idlewild (band) albums Category:Self-released albums Category:2019 albums Category:Albums recorded at Kingsize Soundlabs
title: Interview Music
